Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Root/Wallace
ShortDescription: Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Root, Wallace, then resuming their normal route on 43rd due to street blockage near Root/Wallace.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Root, Wallace, then resuming their normal route on 43rd due to street blockage near Root/Wallace.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Lawrence
ShortDescription: #36 Broadway buses are rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Wilson, Sheridan, Lawrence & Broadway due to due to a parade/festival near Broadway/Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Wilson, Sheridan, Lawrence, then resume their normal route on Broadway due to due to a parade/festival near Broadway/Lawrence.

Allow extra travel time.
